item.title: Demo Environments and what I learned from implementing one
item.description: üêº TLDR: I got the task to implement a Demo environment, learned something about Laravel Factories and the usage of an environment to give possible customers / investors a taste of your product and the developers to find response time / query problems and UX bugs
